mike amundsen wrote:
> you build clients based on the media type.
Any given resource may have multiple representations that have exactly 
the same media type; for example, an image resource may have an 
image/png representing the full content as well as an image/png 
representing a thumbnail.  Content negotiation based only on media type 
isn't sufficient.

-rg
